channel.title: Adding Objects
channel.description:
How do I add an object into EasyRSC?
I've edited server - conf - server - locs - GameObjectLoc.xml and then compressed but the objects don't appear in the game

item.title: Adding Objects
item.dc:creator: @tigerclan tigerclan
item.description:
@tigerclan wrote:

[quote=“matty matt, post:9, topic:520440”][quote author=tigerclan link=topic=638936.msg4307297#msg4307297 date=1370114853]

use this tut it has everything you need http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363007.0.html
Also, for other questions in the top right there is a search button that has lots of topics to help hope this helps

EDIT: it amazes me that people will try to help this guy when there is already a tut to help him. On the other hand i ask for help with moparclassic and get shit on… i think im figuring it out

Because he hasn’t posted 20 common sense posts
[/quote]
gtfo man you dont even know how to do shit either so stop acting like you do. Whatever you can do, you had to ask how it was done to be able so shut the love up[/quote]

Not everything, and I didn’t have to ask the same questions over and over (and over) again. I asked one time and then learned how to do it. I also did a ton of programming without asking questions. And if you look, my last help question was almost 2 months ago. I never claimed I was some elite programmer. Maybe if you didn’t post some melodramatic ass response to this post I wouldn’t have said anything

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Objects
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“tigerclan, post:4, topic:520440”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=638936.msg4306868#msg4306868 date=1370014740]
Post your xml work.
[/quote]

That.

And also, what did you use to compress it?[/quote]The PersistenceManager checks the extension of the requested files, so technically you don’t have to compress the xml data. At least on a large majority of RSCD based server.

Read full topic
